thread.title: Jargon Technologies announces Ultra HD Blu-ray™ Authoring Solution Demo
thread.title_full: Jargon Technologies announces Ultra HD Blu-ray™ Authoring Solution Demo

author: Bhanu Srikanth
title: Jargon Technologies announces Ultra HD Blu-ray™ Authoring Solution Demo
text:
Jargon Technologies announced the availability of a special demo version for Indigo Ultra™, a comprehensive authoring platform for Blu-ray™, Blu-ray 3D™, and ULTRA HD Blu-ray™. Indigo Ultra™ is based on Panasonic’s original authoring platform, and provides a streamlined, easy to use solution for authoring complex next-generation titles. This special version of Indigo Ultra™ is targeted at facilities that did not have the opportunity to participate in the beta program. They now can test drive Indigo Ultra™ without any obligations for purchase. The demo version demonstrates all functionality of the full version, short of generating disc image output.
"This version will not only give our prospective clients an overview of the workflow and user experience of Indigo Ultra™ but will also introduce them to the nuances of Ultra HD Blu-ray™ specification.", said Bhanu Srikanth, CEO of Jargon Technologies.
Companies can sign up to receive the demonstration version of Indigo Ultra™ at http://www.jargon-tech.com/website/indigo.html .
